author: rcm
msg: The error view now displays the basic exception; nothing special is done for a applicaiton exception

author: rcm
msg: Extended the debug options in the viewer to allow details about just the object to be viewed (no view details are shown). Also added an option to force a log snapshot to be taken when using ny of the snapshot appenders.

author: rcm
msg: Updated DataHelper to restore objects using all the data available, reveating objects that are not known on a node and updating those that already exist

author: rcm
msg: renamed the initAssociation method for consistency
